commit message: Start drafting of implementation of triggers UI
Make the log tag more unique. Currently trying to see the last bits of the bug I was mentioning last commit to see how the service is behaving with catlog.
Rewrite the UI to still be modular, but to avoid using fragments. This is resolve issue #2, because fragment lifecycles are finicky.

Implement CRUD operations for the triggers and continue implementing the GUI for the triggers.

Note: The chakra icons for the expanders are just placeholders until I figure out how to get the expanders from the system.
Remove any leftover references to the fragments being converted to views. Not doing so would confuse people.
Move the datetime picker into its own widget to decouple it from the datetime preference
Move the animator for the FAB into the widgets package
Put an input filter on latitude and longitude to clamp them to their minimum and maximum values.
Add planet day names. Also, swap the labels for Jupiter and Saturn. I accidentally mixed them up.
Continue implementing the GUI for the alert triggers CRUD
Hide the menu entry for the WIP alert trigger UI and bump version code
